newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: Soccer-Sikhosana hat-trick puts Pirates into final.
newsitem.headline: Soccer-Sikhosana hat-trick puts Pirates into final.

text.p: African champions Orlando Pirates reached the final of South Africa's national cup competition, the Super Bowl, with a 4-1 win over big rivals Kaizer Chiefs at the weekend.
Jerry Sikhosana scored a hat-trick for Pirates who now meet Jomo Cosmos in the final on November 23.
A last-minute goal by Mozambican international Nuro Tualibudene gave Cosmos a 1-0 win over holders Cape Town Spurs in their semifinal on Sunday.
